name: Guitar Scorist
description:
If you are bored of Guitar Tabs and want to learn playing guitar in a professional way, this app is definitely for you. With Guitar Scorist you can learn real guitar score reading very easily and effectively.If you think that you are already a good reader then you can compete with other Scorists in the Game Center.


-Real guitar sound samples. No MIDI sounds!
-Random notes according to selected level for each session.
-Right handed or left handed options.
-First four frets including open strings.
-Training mode for beginners.
-Free Style mode for experimenters.

Level 1: Includes only open strings.
Level 2: Includes 1st and 2nd string notes without accidentals.
Level 3: Includes 3rd string notes without accidentals.
Level 4: Includes 5th string notes without accidentals.
Level 5: Includes the accidentals of first two strings.
Level 6: Includes the accidentals of first three strings.
Level 7: Includes the accidentals of first 5 strings and 6th string notes without its accidentals.
Level 8: Includes all notes of four frets.

* All levels include previous levels.
